snippet: WEINER--Walter H. We mourn the loss of Walter, a wonderful friend of more than 50 years. He influenced our lives in many ways great and small. Heartfelt condolences to our close and loving friend Nina and to the entire family. Paulette and Joe Rose 1/3
lead_paragraph: WEINER--Walter H. We mourn the loss of Walter, a wonderful friend of more than 50 years. He influenced our lives in many ways great and small. Heartfelt condolences to our close and loving friend Nina and to the entire family. Paulette and Joe Rose 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEINER, WALTER H
